resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

We believe we are a customer focused, environmentally aware service business,delivering real results in partnership with customers, enabling cost savings over a short or an extended period. Our dedicated team has an excellent track record in customer service, and with over years of operating experience, our expert knowledge is second to none and is always consistently professional in line with the needs of your residence, business or industry. With time increasingly at a premium we also ensure we add value to your property by making everything as streamlined as possible.
No matter the size of your premises, no matter how many sites you have, Taka Kenya is a “one-stop solution” for all your waste needs.
